name: Taco Tower
description:
A throwback to ultra linear platformers like Super Mario Bros, with a western theme!

You are in the shoes of a man named Pedro. You must venture to the ancient Taco Tower and reclaim it from the monsters that are on the loose in Pedro's desert homeland.

controls:

A - left

D - right

S - down

W - up

L - jump

K - fire gun

(game itself explains the controls)
